snippet.title: Dog Man: Mission Impawsible | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Dog Man: Mission Impawsible brings the beloved book series to life. Help Dog Man and his friends chase down the supa bad guys in their most impawsible mission yet!
Visit our website for more information https://www.mindscape.com/dogman

Play the Demo now on Nintendo Switch and Steam. 
Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4|5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam on December 6th 2024. 

-

Subscribe and turn on notifications to get notified about the newest game releases for the PlayStation 4/5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PC! 🎮

-

Mindscape is a game publisher with a rich legacy. Since the 80s, Mindscape has been publishing games for platforms like the Commodore Amiga, eventually growing into a worldwide publisher known for iconic titles such as Prince of Persia, Myst, Riven, Reader Rabbit, and Team Apache. In the last decade, Mindscape has revamped its brand to embrace the future, publishing games on platforms including PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, PC Steam and Xbox. Over the past five years, we have distributed and published numerous successful games like Windstorm, Gear.Club, Asterix, Smurfs, Kena: Bridge of Spirits and Story of Seasons.

Our own line up of adventure-, platform- and puzzle games has also made a significant impact, with global (digital) releases. We take pride in our games being available worldwide in multiple languages. Looking ahead, we are committed to developing and publishing exciting and enjoyable titles under the legendary Mindscape label. Stay tuned for more new projects and exciting adventures that we will release in the coming years!

Follow our social media channels for more information about the game:
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/mindscape.official/
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/MindscapeGames
Twitter : https://twitter.com/MindscapeGames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mindscapegames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/mindscape
